channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:13 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 16:13 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region.Creck on further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 15:10 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 15:10 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
